name: No Parking Sign
description: Usually placed on sign or sidewalks indicating that parking is prohibited in that area.

name: No Smoking Sign
description: The no smoking symbol consists of a red circle with a red diagonal line through a lit cigarette, indicating smoking is prohibited in that area.

name: Put ON Seatbelt Sign
description: The seatbelt symbol typically resembles a person wearing a seatbelt, often illuminated in cars on the dashboard to remind passengers to buckle up for safety.

name: OnWay Sign
description: usually seen on roads or sign indicating traffic flow in that specific direction.

name: Zebra Crossing
description: typically seen at pedestrian crossings, indicating a designated area for pedestrians to safely cross the street.

name: Peace Sign
description: The logo came to be known as the “peace symbol.” The symbol was widely used by a whole generation who stood for peace and a war-free world.

name: Prohibition Sign
description: Prohibition sign are universal symbols designed to denote actions or behaviors that are not allowed in a given area.

name: Warning Sign
description: Warning sign serve as precautionary alerts, informing individuals of potential dangers or risks.

name: Flammable Sign
description: Post durable Flammable Signin your facility to mark hazardous materials that can cause fires and explosions.

name: Explosive Sign
description: Explosive sign are stark warnings about materials that have the potential to detonate.

name: Fire Extinguisher Sign
description: A fire extinguisher is a handheld active fire protection device usually filled with a dry or wet chemical used to extinguish or control small fires, often in emergencies.

name: Biohazard Sign
description: Biohazard sign represent threats at a microscopic level and feature a distinct trefoil design on a contrasting yellow background.

name: High Voltage Sign
description: High voltage sign are warnings that come in various design, often with jagged lines symbolizing electricity, highlighting the dangers of electrical energy.

name: Radioactive Sign
description: Vivid warnings flashing danger unseen: stay back, stay safe.

name: Toxic/Poison Sign
description: Represented by the universally feared skull and crossbones symbol, these sign are dire warnings.

name: Wet Floor Sign
description: Slip and fall accidents are common and can lead to severe injuries. The “Wet Floor” sign, typically featuring.

name: Restricted Area Sign
description: Not all zones in a facility are safe or meant for general access. The “Restricted Area” sign demarcates zones off-limits to unauthorized personnel, often due to safety concerns, sensitive information, or specialized equipment.

name: Oxidizer Sign
description: Fuel for fire: Handle with care, avoid sparks.

name: Under Construction Sign
description: These sign provide general information about the construction project.

name: Emergency Assembly Point Sign
description: Emergency Assembly Point sign play a crucial role in directing people to safety during an emergency evacuation.

name: First Aid Sign
description: First aid sign, like beacons in a storm, guide us to essential medical supplies and assistance in times of need.

name: Emergency Exit Sign
description: Knowing where the exits are can be lifesaving in situations that require a swift evacuation, like fires or other emergencies

name: Wear Mask Sign
description: Instructing individuals to wear masks as a preventive measure against the spread of infectious diseases.

name: Tripping Hazard Sign
description: A Tripping Hazard sign typically displays a person falling or stumbling.

name: Low Temperature Sign
description: A Low Temperature Hazard sign typically features an icicle or thermometer symbol, indicating the risk of extremely cold conditions.

name: Hot Surface Sign
description: A Heated Surface sign usually displays a symbol of radiating heat waves or a hot surface icon.

name: Eye Protection Sign
description: An Eye Protection Required sign typically features an image of protective goggles, emphasizing the mandatory use of eye safety gear.

name: Health hazard symbol
description: This sign alerts people to chemicals and materials that are harmful to human health, particularly carcinogens.

name: Gas cylinder Sign
description: A gas cylinder sign indicates that gas is being stored under pressure.

name: Fire Hydrant Sign
description: Red standpipe silhouette on a yellow background, a universal symbol for life-saving water flow in emergencies.

name: Stop Sign
description: he iconic octagon in red demands a complete stop before proceeding.

name: Yield Sign
description: The inverted triangle in yellow instructs to slow down and give way to traffic with the right of way.

name: Speed Limit Sign
description: Circular with a red border, it displays the maximum permissible speed.

name: Falling Rocks Sign
description: Triangular with downward arrows and rocks, it warns of falling debris.

name: Slippery When Wet Sign
description: Yellow rectangle with diagonal lines and raindrops, it warns of slippery surfaces during rain.

name: Deer Crossing Sign
description: Rectangular with a silhouette of a deer, it warns of potential animal crossings.

name: School Crossing Sign
description: Yellow rectangle with a black schoolhouse symbol, it warns of a school zone and children crossing.

name: Wash Hand Sign
description: Instructing individuals to wash their hands, emphasizing good hygiene practices for cleanliness and disease prevention.

name: Hospital Sign
description: indicating the location of a hospital or healthcare facility.

name: bus stop Sign
description: Rectangular sign with the letters BUS STOP in white on a contrasting background, indicating a designated area for buses to pick up or drop off passenge

name: Trucks Prohibited Sign
description: Red circle with a white horizontal bar and a black symbol of a truck, indicating that trucks are prohibited in that area.

name: Right Turn Prohibited Sign
description: Red circle with a white horizontal bar and a black arrow turning right, indicating that right turns are prohibited at that location.

name: Left Turn Prohibited Sign
description: Red circle with a white horizontal bar and a black arrow turning left, indicating that left turns are prohibited at that location.

name: Horn Prohibited Sign
description: A red circle with a slash through a stylized trumpet, silencing the urge to honk and promoting peace on the road.

name: Turn Left Sign
description: A white arrow pointing left within a green circle, indicating that left turns are allowed at the specified location or intersection.

name: Turn Right Sign
description: White arrow pointing right within a green circle, indicating that right turns are allowed at the specified location or intersection.

name: Public Telephone Sign
description: A publicly accessible telephone, typically found in public spaces, allowing individuals to make phone calls.

name: Petrol Pump Sign
description: A distinctive sign at a petrol pump, often featuring symbols or text indicating the availability of gasoline or other fuels for vehicles.

name: Eating Place Ahead Sign
description: A road sign indicating the presence of a restaurant or eating place ahead.

name: Don Not Overtakek Sign
description: indicating that overtaking or passing other vehicles is prohibited.

name: Air port Sign
description: A sign with an airplane symbol or text indicating the direction to an airport, guiding travelers to the location of an aviation facility.

name: No Wating sign
description: indicating that waiting is not allowed in the specified area, often used in areas with restrictions on parking or stopping.

name: No Bycicle Sign
description: Indicating that bicycles are not allowed in the designated area or on a specific path.

name: Staggered junction Sign
description: This sign warns drivers that a side road that is broken up joins and leaves the current road.

name: Traffic Light Sign
description: Controlling the flow of traffic at an intersection, with each color indicating specific actions for drivers and pedestrians.

name: Narrow Bridge Ahead Sign
description: A road sign warning of an upcoming narrow bridge.

name: Road Widens Ahead Sign
description: A road sign indicating that the road is about to widen ahead.

name: Left Reverse Bend Sign
description: A road sign indicating a left reverse bend, alerting drivers to an upcoming leftward curve in the road that may require caution and reduced speed

name: Y – INTERSECTION Sign
description: A road sign indicating a Y-intersection ahead, where the road splits into two branches forming a Y shape, and drivers need to choose between the two directions.

name: Railway Crossing Sign
description: A road sign warning of an upcoming railway crossing.

name: Parking This Side Sign
description: This sign is erected at destination telling exactly where to park your vehicles.

name: Parking Both Side Sign
description: This sign indicates that vehicles can be parked on both sides.

name: Women Sign
description: A symbol representing women.

name: Men Sign
description: A symbol representing Men.

name: Dustbin Sign
description: A symbol depicting a waste receptacle, commonly used to indicate the location of a dustbin or trash bin for disposing of waste materials.

name: Handicapped Sign
description: A universal symbol featuring a person in a wheelchair, indicating accessibility for individuals
